name: jxSwing
short_description:
Swing Class Library


Este projeto reune classes e componentes Swing que procuram facilitar o desenvolvimento de aplicações Desktop em Java.

Ele está sendo desenvolvido utilizando a OpenJDK 7u75 e as blibliotecas:

- apache-poi
- google-gson
- jxUtils
- xstream


This project brings together classes and Swing components that aim to facilitate the development of desktop applications in Java.

It is being developed using the OpenJDK 7u75 and libraries:

- apache-poi
- google-gson
- jxUtils
- xstream


Alguns Componentes/Some Components:

-> BeanTablePanel, BeanTable e BeanTableModel
-> MoneyField, NumberField, DateField, etc...
-> DirectoryChooser, FileChooser
-> Buttons
-> FontComboBox, ImageComboBox, CheckedComboBox
-> StatusBar
-> I18N
